channel.title: What should i do?
channel.description: For the past month i have been looking for the 'perfect' source that fits my needs and everyone else likes. But i haven't found any. When i look at a server status page such as www.codefasga.com/status or the moparscape one. Out of one hundred servers there are 85 delta and 15 czar based ones. I have tried running a czar and the most i could have gotten was nearly 8 people, I even advertised and made youtube videos and put it on every server status page. I tried running a delta server which is the most common now a days and i couldn't even get 4 people to stay logged on even when i give them all admin. I only do 317's and i only host servers compatible with silab and moparscape webclient. What do you suggest i should do? What servers do people play? What server base should i use? How do i get 30+ players on this server you suggest to me? Please help me it would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Download a source that you like, then code it and make it unique and different from the others. People won’t get bored as easily that way

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Well, tbh i don’t like minigames or anything. I just like a good realistic PK server.

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @Full_Throttle Full Throttle
item.description:
@Full_Throttle wrote:

No, people like servers with minigames and skilling also.

Read full topic

item.title: What should i do?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

Pk servers, like 100% pk. Normaly i get about 10-20 people online at once if i host one. They love it, and so do i! And the people come back the next day, too! Keep it up about 2-3 days straight and if the uptime gets messed up, you still have them coming back

Read full topic
